net.sourceforge.earticleast.app
Class VariableBindingManager

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.earticleast.app.VariableBindingManager

public class VariableBindingManager
extends java.lang.Object

A class that collects information about the declaration, the assignment of a local variable and the first reference to a local variable.

Project page: http://sourceforge.net/projects/earticleast

Author:
Thomas Kuhn

variableRefereneced

public void variableRefereneced(org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.SimpleName reference)

public void variableInitialized(org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.Expression initializer)
Call this method to report an assignment of the variable

Parameters:
initializer - the AST node that represents the value of the assignment

moveFirstReferenceOneBlockLevelUp

private void moveFirstReferenceOneBlockLevelUp()
Sets the firstReference one block level up. For example, suppose System.out.println(x); is the {firstReference statement in 
          ...
          {
                ...
                {
                        ...
                        System.out.println(x); // <- first reference statement
                        ...
                }
          }
after calling the method, the first reference statement will be the inner block: 
          ...
          {
                ...
                { // <- first reference statement
                        ...
                        System.out.println(x);
                        ...
                }
          }
And after a subsequent call, the out block: 
          ...
          { // <- first reference statement
                ...
                {
                        ...
                        System.out.println(x);
                        ...
                }
          }

isReferenceWhithinScope

private boolean isReferenceWhithinScope(org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.SimpleName reference)
Checks whether reference is within the same or within an underlying block like firstReference.

Parameters:
reference - the reference to be tested
Returns:
true, if reference is within the same or underlying block. false otherwise.

getParentStatement

private org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.Statement getParentStatement(org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.SimpleName reference)
Gets the surrounding Statement of this a SimpleName ast node.

Parameters:
reference - any SimpleName
Returns:
the surrounding Statement as found in the AST parent-child hierarchy

isAlreadyReferenced

private boolean isAlreadyReferenced()
Tells us whether already a reference to the local variable has been recorded.

Returns:
true if a reference has been recorded, false otherwise

getInitializer

public org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.Expression getInitializer()
Getter for the last initializer value, before the variable is referenced for the first time.

Returns:
the value the variable has to be initialized with

getVariableDeclarationFragment
